original: intros a l Hin. apply in_split in Hin. destruct Hin as [l1 [l2 Heq]]. exists l1, l2. apply permutation_trans with (l2 := a :: l1 ++ l2). - apply permutation_skip. apply permutation_trans with (l2 := a :: nil ++ l1 ++ l2). + apply permutation_swap. + apply permutation_app_swap. - apply permutation_app_swap.
